references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces Neural Radiance Fields (NeRFs), a foundational technique for novel view synthesis and 3D scene representation that is heavily built upon in this paper.

references.paper_title: Implicit functions in feature space for 3d shape reconstruction and completion
references.reason: This paper presents a technique using implicit functions for 3D shape reconstruction that is relevant to the implicit surface representation approach used in this paper.

references.paper_title: Deep marching cubes: Learning explicit surface representations
references.reason: This work introduces a method for learning explicit surface representations that is related to the differentiable surface extraction method proposed in this paper.

references.paper_title: Deepsdf: Learning continuous signed distance functions for shape representation
references.reason: This paper introduces DeepSDF, a method for learning continuous signed distance functions that directly relates to the implicit surface representation used in this paper.

references.paper_title: Neus: Learning neural implicit surfaces by volume rendering for multi-view reconstruction
references.reason: This paper proposes Neural Implicit Surfaces (NeIS) which is a key technique used in this paper for learning implicit surface representations from multi-view data.
